form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: MEDICAL Examination of Applicants for United States Visas, 157

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/25/2023 Drs. Anderson Pat ners 501. the Building PLACE MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF APPLICANTS Hong Kong. FOR UNITED STATES VISAS DATE OF EXAMINATION 3/31/1987 CITY COUNTRY At the request of the American Consul at Hong Kong BCC NAME AGE SEX I certify that on the above date I examined Shen Yu Ling IR5&1 2/12/1909 78 M WHO BEARS PASSPORT NO. ISSUED BY ON C.I.No. B787463 Hong Kong 1/28/1983 I examined specifically for evidence of any of the following conditions: CLASS A: DANGEROUS CONTAGIOUS DISEASES: Chancroid Lymphogranuloma venereum Gonorrhea Sypnilis, infectious stage Granuloma inguinale Tuberculosis, active Leprosy, infectious MENTAL CONDITIONS: Mental retardation Previous occurrence of one or more Mental defect (mental deficiency) attacks of insanity Narcotic drug addiction Insanity Psychopathic personality Chronic alcoholism Sexual deviation (See proviso, sec. 34.7, USPHS Regs.) CLASS B: Physical Defect, Disease, or Disability Serious in Degree or Permanent in Nature Amounting to a Substantial Departure from Normal Physical Well-Being CLASS C: Minor Conditions. (CHECK NUMBER (1) BELOW OR COMPLETE NUMBER (2)) My examination, including the X-ray and other reports below, revealed: (1) No defect, discase, or disability (2) Defect, disease, or disability, or previous occurrence of one or more attacks of insanity, as follows (give class-A, B, or C--diagnosis, and pertinent details*): Class B: Right hip total replacement 1981 for fracture. Chest X-ray report EK 717 : Normal (Unfolding of aorta noted.) from Dr W F. Watson VDRL : Negative W. F. Watson Blood serological report from Dr. Other special report(s) (when needed) from Dr. W.F. Watson P. &S:D (Obs) R. C. O. G. SIGNATURE OF MEDICAL TECHNICAL ADVISOR Dis TITLE son & Partiests DATE OF FINAL REPORT 501 eMebicalgExaminer 4/2/1987 50157-102 *Continue on reverse side if necessary. Hong, Kong GPO 1982 0 - 361-526 (7317) OPTIONAL FORM 157 (Rev 5-78) Dept. of State
